brand_identity.name: GreenForge OS
brand_identity.target_audience: Plantation Owners, Nursery Managers, Landscape Architects
brand_identity.visual_mood: Deep Obsidian backgrounds met with Electric Bio-Green data streams. Matte finishes, high contrast, no muddy gradients.

headings.usage: All Hero text, Section Headers, Feature Titles. Use font-light for elegance, font-bold for impact.

body.usage: Dashboard tables, data grids, long-form content. Optimized for legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: SKU numbers, API keys, Code snippets, Financial data.

dashboard.rules: No jagged bottoms. Use col-span-2 for primary charts.

marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Use 'The Tall' and 'The Square' spans to create visual tension.

Card.style: Flat, 1px border border-white/10, bg-black/40 (glass). No shadow by default.

textures.noise: Overlay a subtle SVG noise pattern at 3% opacity on the main background to kill digital flatness.

images.description: Modern greenhouse interior with warm night lighting. Use as Hero background with overlay.
Greenhouse walkway. Use for 'Inventory Management' section.
Plants on table. Abstract representation of nature.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px. Use text-accent for active icons.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL FONTS: Add @import statements for 'Outfit' and 'Manrope' in src/index.css immediately.
THEME SETUP: Override tailwind.config.js with the 'Deep Forest Protocol' colors defined above.
MARKETING PAGE: Build the Landing Page using the 'Tetris Grid'. Do not use standard Shadcn Cards here. Use raw HTML/Tailwind.
DASHBOARD: Use Shadcn components (Sidebar, Card, Table) but heavily customized with the 'Component Overrides' styles.
MOTION: Use framer-motion for page transitions and staggering list items. Add `layout` prop to grid items for smooth resizing.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure the Neon Green text is never used on white backgrounds. Only use it on Dark Gray/Black.
NO INTER: Do not use Inter font for headings. Use Outfit.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
